flavorText: Goblin generals don't distinguish between troops and ammunition.

foreignData.flavorText: Goblin-Generäle machen keinen Unterschied zwischen Truppen und Munition.
foreignData.name: Beschuss mit Entbehrlichem
foreignData.text: {R}, opfere eine Kreatur: Der Beschuss mit Entbehrlichem fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

foreignData.flavorText: Los generales trasgos no distinguen entre tropas y munición.
foreignData.name: Andanada de prescindibles
foreignData.text: {R}, sacrificar una criatura: La Andanada de prescindibles hace 1 punto de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: Les généraux gobelins ne font pas la différence entre troupes et munitions.
foreignData.name: Barrage de sacrifiables
foreignData.text: {R}, sacrifiez une créature : Le Barrage de sacrifiables inflige 1 blessure à une cible, créature ou joueur.

foreignData.flavorText: I generali goblin non fanno distinzione tra truppe e munizioni.
foreignData.name: Sbarramento di Sacrificabili
foreignData.text: {R}, Sacrifica una creatura: Lo Sbarramento di Sacrificabili infligge 1 danno a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: ゴブリンの将軍は兵隊と弾薬を区別しない。
foreignData.name: 消耗品の弾幕
foreignData.text: {R}, クリーチャーを１体生け贄に捧げる：クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。消耗品の弾幕はそれに１点のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText: 고블린 장군들은 병사와 탄환을 구분하지 않는다.
foreignData.name: 잔챙이 포격
foreignData.text: {R}, 생물 한 개를 희생한다: 생물 한 개 또는 플레이어 한 명을 목표로 정한다. 잔챙이 포격은 그 목표에 피해 1점을 입힌다.

foreignData.flavorText: Os generais goblins não fazem distinção entre as tropas e a munição.
foreignData.name: Barreira de Descartáveis
foreignData.text: {R}, Sacrifique uma criatura: Barreira de Descartáveis causa 1 ponto de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: Гоблинские генералы не видят разницы между войсками и боеприпасами.
foreignData.name: Залп Салагами
foreignData.text: {R}, пожертвуйте существо: Залп Салагами наносит 1 повреждение целевому существу или игроку.

foreignData.flavorText: 鬼怪将军不会区分部队和弹药。
foreignData.name: 炮灰投射
foreignData.text: {R}，牺牲一个生物：炮灰投射对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。

foreignData.flavorText: 鬼怪將軍不會區分部隊和彈藥。
foreignData.name: 炮灰投射
foreignData.text: {R}，犧牲一個生物：炮灰投射對目標生物或玩家造成1點傷害。

name: Barrage of Expendables
originalText: {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Barrage of Expendables deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

rulings.text: Barrage of Expendables deals the damage, not the sacrificed creature. Notably, that creature having deathtouch or lifelink provides no additional benefit.

Because targets are chosen before costs are paid, it is possible to choose a creature as the target of the ability and then sacrifice that creature. The ability won’t resolve when it tries to resolve and no damage will be dealt.

text: {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Barrage of Expendables deals 1 damage to any target.
